strings.Value: "Couldn't we find a better place to rest?"
"Apparently, trying to get ourselves killed by monsters and bandits is no longer exciting enough. Now we're spending our nights in their lairs!"
"Just try not to think about it. Tell us about your adventures instead!"
"Couldn't you keep your mouth shut just once? Stop your complaining and pretend you have some shred of dignity."
"This crappy place fits you better than anything else, gnome."
"Didn't get enough walking today already? Ready to gather your things, move the tents and make a fire someplace more to your liking? Go ahead then! Be my guest!"
